skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excess baggage
des:
Listen to this story with a timeless lesson. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. 
This Buddhist story is about minimalism, mountaineering and Buddhist spirituality. Guccha, the central character, dreams to become a light worker and achieve Bodhi Chitta, but suffers from a monkey's mind. He takes the help of a spiritual adviser, on his path, a path to his indigenous mountain self, maybe you will find yours too.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
